Content:: Ratnayake Mudiyanselage Amara Piyaseeli Ratnayake is a Sri Lankan politician and was the 9th Governor of the North Western Province. She was a former member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka and a former government minister, being the Minister of Woman's affairs in the 2001-2004 United National Party government.[1][2] She is a longstanding MP of the United National Party for the Wariyapola Electorate. She entered politics from Kurunegala after her husband's death.  This article about a politician from North Western Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Amara Piyaseeli Ratnayake - Wikipedia
